lessons.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to HTML
lessons.intro: This lesson covers the basics of HTML.
lessons.lesson_content: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language...
key_points: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages.
HTML elements are represented by tags.
HTML documents are files that end with .html.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: CSS Basics
lessons.intro: This lesson introduces CSS for styling web pages.
lessons.lesson_content: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets...
key_points: CSS is used to control the layout of web pages.
CSS can be added to HTML elements in three ways.
CSS rules consist of selectors and declarations.
